idea: Voxxeltek is a global company with insights into cutting-edge, current and future tech, that renders services and builds products in the realm of emerging technologies. In a world of blurring boundaries between reality and fantasy, of hyper-reality and boundless creativity, and transformed, real-time communication, our endeavor is to give brands a competitive edge in a very competitive market and build a high-end range of state-of-the-art immersive tech products for consumers.
name: VOXXELTEK LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1. What is that one thing that today's busy consumer craves for? 

-The answer is the ease and simplicity of any product that can get delivered at their door step with just one click of a button

2. Nowadays even the smallest of the things are getting home delivered then why not Alcohol?

-This is where "Ghar-O-Bar" steps in. 

3. Ghar-O-Bar is an online Alcohol ordering and delivery platform.

4. We at "Ghar-O-Bar" aim to deliver Alcohol till the door step of those customers who are legally eligible for purchasing it. 

5. "Ghar-O-Bar" will help in stabilizing the revenue of the government during these difficult days.

6.This will inturn encourage employment and will play its part in the P.M's initiative of being "Aatma-Nirbhar" and making India Digital through the growth of E-commerce
name: Ghar-O-Bar

idea: Platform as a service for delivery of alcohol from wineshop to customers.
name: Chakna Pani

idea:
Paravent Apparels is a range of everyday clothing with certified antiviral properties.


We make premium quality protective garments which protect the
wearer from viruses. Our garments are made from a fabric that kills
99.19% of viruses that come in contact. Through our products, we
make sure that our customers as well as their families are safe against
unintended transmission of viruses. With this added layer of immunity,
we enable our customers to stay healthy even in harsh environments.


We offer a diverse array of made-on-order apparel products which
cater to the needs of customers spanning from school kids to
mature working professionals across industries. We also provide
some ready-to-order essential products to fulfill our customers’ daily
needs.
name: Paravent Apparels

idea:
EIEN BIOSCIENCE provides collaborated services of Scientific Services for the Pharmaceutical and Medical Device industry.


EIEN Biosciences specializes in Clinical Development specific to Regulatory/Medical Writing Scientific Communication/ Medico Marketing, Data Management & Biostatistics, QA services of Technical Documents, and Global Translation Services to Pharmaceutical, Medical Devices & Clinical contract research organizations. Eien Biosciences pledges itself on being a problem solving, solution-minded origination. With our novel methodologies and a passion for doing great work, we transform challenges into opportunities for our clients.
name: EIEN BIOSCIENCES

idea:
GoIslandTrips too has life and a beating heart. We are a TRAVEL AGGREGATOR & SERVICES. GoIslandTrips.com is a travel aggregator and services company catering to offering the BEST of ALL holiday/Business or Leisure travel packages on ALL the exotic destinations in the pristine and virgin INDIAN OCEAN. The countries and regions we cater are   

* India

* Maldives

* Mauritius

* Mombasa

* Sri Lanka

* Seychelles

* Zanzibar
name: Go Island Trips

idea:
Online-Plus-Offline (OPlussO), is a India’s first next generation Retail Store and business model that finds potential customers online and brings them into the real world to make it purchases in physical retail stores.

One of the newer aspect of O2O initiatives is that customers ability find product from their desirable retail store and to pay online and then pick up a product from a desirable retail stores or can be delivered to their doorstep

The OplussO is brand of Toolheal Expert Services Private Limited only.
name: Toolheal Expert Services Private Limited
